text: @realDonaldTrump Hey #PresidentPineSol? Your failed leadership and incompetence has caused the USA to have more than TWICE the COVID19 deaths than the next highest country. That’s the only BIG RECORD anyone cares about and it’s the only one you will be remembered for!!! https://t.co/PZanCvSJk2
